name: Novozymes
goal: Novozymes produces a wide range of industrial enzymes and microorganisms. We believe that we have innovative answers to some of the world’s most pressing challenges. Used in the manufacture of a wide variety of products, our innovative biological solutions improve the efficiency of processes both in industry and in everyday life by saving energy, water and other raw materials, while reducing waste.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Consumers, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, International co-operation and development, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Taxation, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives:
Clean Energy Package (Renewable Energy Directive)
Low emission Mobility (CO2 emissions from cars)
Horizon 2020 (Bio-based Industries Joint Undertaking)
Fertilisers Regulation
Circular Economy
Sustainable Developments Goals (SDGs)
Common Agricultural Policy
Bioeconomy Strategy
GMO Directive
